TopicTitle: Jeb finds a piece of history.

Articles.Content:
Yeah, not a lot of story here; Jebediah flew Kerbpollo 1's lander and managed to touch down right next to Pegasus 1; the first object (in this run) that I sent to the Mun. There he is posing happily next to the probe!

Just thought it was a hell of a cool shot. XD

are those spherical tanks a mod?

Yup! They're hemispherical, part of the Turbo Nisu Parts Pack. Looking for a link.

[edit] Got it! http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/69539-0-23-Stockalike-parts-for-useful-esthetics
And iirc that spherical pod is from the HGR R&D thread, right? The Spud pod?

Yeah, not a lot of story here; Jebediah flew Kerbpollo 1's lander and managed to touch down right next to Pegasus 1; the first object (in this run) that I sent to the Mun. There he is posing happily next to the probe!

Just thought it was a hell of a cool shot. XD

Did you try and land there intentionally, or did it just happen? (the odds of that...)

Did you try and land there intentionally, or did it just happen? (the odds of that...)

Fifty-fifty. I tried to land close to it, but I'd figured on several kilometers between 'em. somehow I just -nailed- the landing!
